name: Sorted
headline: Instant SaaS management
description:
The first completely automated SaaS management software. 
Scrap the spreadsheets and avoid slack surveys when you need to run compliance audits, provisioning users, or track unused licenses. Sorted provides visibility to admins in 2 minutes without sacrificing employee flexibility.
generated_description:
Sorted is an innovative company based in Copenhagen, Denmark, founded in 2022. Its mission? To make SaaS (Software as a Service) management instantaneous and hassle-free. They're not just another startup; they're the first fully automated SaaS management software, aiming to replace outdated tools like spreadsheets and cumbersome slack surveys, especially during compliance audits and user provisioning.

In just two minutes, Sorted provides administrators with a clear overview of the tools being utilized in their organization, helping them track unused licenses and manage user access without disrupting employee workflows. The simplicity of their product allows organizations to engage with their SaaS offerings with agility—no more tedious setups or lengthy configurations. Want to see what tools your team is actually using? Sorted makes that possible with a mere few clicks.

Part of Y Combinator’s Batch W23, Sorted is gaining traction in the B2B productivity space, tagged appropriately with keywords like 'saas', 'productivity', 'collaboration', and 'subscriptions'. The team currently consists of just two employees but this lean structure allows for agility and quick iterations on product development. Jared Friedman, a notable Group Partner at Y Combinator, is associated with them, which adds a compelling layer of credibility.

The approach Sorted takes is refreshingly straightforward: Sign up, get the Sorted Chrome extension, and watch as it gathers all relevant data regarding your tools and costs in moments, helping you stay on top of your SaaS spend. With over 50 integrations, it aims to untangle user access and highlight savings opportunities effectively.

If you’re keen on cutting through the SaaS clutter and maintaining flexibility while ensuring compliance, Sorted provides a viable solution. Check them out more at their [website](https://sorted-lp.webflow.io/) and consider joining their early access program; they seem more than ready to help businesses get sorted—no pun intended!
